text:
It's raining all of a sudden...
Let's take shelter from the rain here for a bit.

Rinze, are you okay?
If you need, you can use my handkerchief...

Oh, you had one.
That's good.

By the way, you'll be trying on the new costume after
this, right? Actually, it's themed around "a fox's wedding".
Yeah, I thought it was a coincidence.

Maybe...somewhere...
a fox's wedding is happening...
